00030 #define NEWMAT_USING_FLOAT
00031 #include "copynumber/CNAnalysisMethod.h"
00032 //
00033 #include "util/AffxArray.h"

00035 #include <vector>

00037 
00038 class PDNNProbe
00039 {
00040 public:
00041     int ProbeID;
00042     double ProbeEffect;
00043     int ProbeSetIndex;
00044     char Allele;
00045     AffxString Sequence;
00046     float MedianIntensity;
00047     float PredictedIntensity;
00048 
00049     PDNNProbe()
00050     {
00051         ProbeID = 0;
00052         ProbeEffect = 0;
00053         ProbeSetIndex = -1;
00054         Allele = 0;
00055         MedianIntensity = 0;
00056         PredictedIntensity = 0;
00057     }
00058 
00059     int compareTo(PDNNProbe& that, int iCompareCode)
00060     {
00061         int iCompareResult = 0;
00062         switch (iCompareCode)
00063         {
00064         case 0:
00065             iCompareResult = AffxArray<int>::compare(ProbeID, that.ProbeID);
00066             break;
00067         }
00068         return iCompareResult;
00069     }
00070 
00071     template<int k> struct ComparePred {
00072         bool operator()(const PDNNProbe* lhs, const PDNNProbe* rhs) const {
00073             Err::errAbort("PDNNProbe: ComparePred instantiated with an invalid compare code = " + ToStr(k));
00074             return false;
00075         }
00076     };
00077 };
00078 
00079 template<> struct PDNNProbe::ComparePred<0> {
00080     bool operator()(const PDNNProbe* lhs, const PDNNProbe* rhs) const {
00081         return AffxArray<int>::compare(lhs->ProbeID, rhs->ProbeID) < 0;
00082     }
00083 };
00084 
00085 /**
00086  * @brief  A class for calulating pdnn.
00087  *
00088  */
00089 class CNReferenceMethodPDNN : CNAnalysisMethod
00090 {
00091 public:
00092     CNReferenceMethodPDNN();
00093     virtual ~CNReferenceMethodPDNN();
00094 
00095     static std::string getType() { return "pdnn-reference-method"; }
00096     static std::string getDescription() { return "CopyNumber PDNN"; }
00097     static std::string getVersion() { return "1.0"; }
00098 
00099     static SelfDoc explainSelf();
00100     static std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> getDefaultDocOptions();
00101     static SelfCreate * newObject(std::map<std::string, std::string> & param);
00102 
00103     virtual AffxString getName() { return getType(); }
00104     virtual void run();
00105     virtual bool isSegmentTypeAnalysis() { return false; }
00106 
00107 private:
00108     void loadProbes(const std::string& strReferenceFileName, const std::string& str1lqFileName, AffxArray<PDNNProbe>& vPDNNProbes);
00109     void getRandomSample(int iPopulationSize, int iSampleSize, std::vector<int>& vRandomSample);
00110     char getDinucleotideType(char c1, char c2);
00111     void svd(Matrix& mxX, DiagonalMatrix& mxDiagonal, Matrix& mxU, Matrix& mxV, Matrix& mxData, ColumnVector& vResult);
00112     void invertDiagonal(DiagonalMatrix& mxDiagonal);
00113     void flipSignIfNeeded(ColumnVector& vWeights, ColumnVector& vEnergy, Matrix& mxX);
00114     bool hasConverged(unsigned int uiProbeLength, int iIteration, ColumnVector& vSampledIntensities, Matrix& X, ColumnVector& vEnergy, ColumnVector& vPrevEnergy, ColumnVector& vWeights, ColumnVector& vPrevWeights, double& dPrevFit, double dTOL);
00115     void updateReference(const std::string& strReferenceFileName, AffxArray<PDNNProbe>& vPDNNProbes);
00116 };
